text: Andrei Leonidovich Aleksandrov (; born 9 February 1968) is a former Russian football player. ==Club career== He played in lower leagues of Russian football, including three seasons in the second-tier Russian Football National League. Playing for Galaks in 1992 in the away game against FC Volochanin Vyshny Volochyok (1–1) he saved the first three penalty kicks, and when the referee appointed the fourth one he took off his pants and turned to him, for which he was shown a red card. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1968 births Category:Russian footballers Category:Living people Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:FC Zenit Saint Petersburg players Category:FC Dynamo Saint Petersburg players Category:FC Znamya Truda Orekhovo-Zuyevo players
title: Andrei Aleksandrov
